mapper.select: SELECT `UPID` ,`predictOrder` ,`UID` ,`predictRGID` ,`weatherType` ,`predictedNum1` ,`predictedNum2` ,`realNum1` ,`realNum2` ,`result` ,`scored` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `userpredict` WHERE `UID` = #{UID} AND DATE(`createdAt`) = CURDATE() ORDER BY `predictOrder` ASC;

SELECT `UPID` ,`predictOrder` ,`UID` ,`predictRGID` ,`weatherType` ,`predictedNum1` ,`predictedNum2` ,`realNum1` ,`realNum2` ,`result` ,`scored` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `userpredict` WHERE `scored` = 1 AND DATE(`createdAt`) <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 DAY)

SELECT `UPID` ,`predictOrder` ,`UID` ,`predictRGID` ,`weatherType` ,`predictedNum1` ,`predictedNum2` ,`realNum1` ,`realNum2` ,`result` ,`scored` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `userpredict` WHERE `UID` = #{UID} ORDER BY `createdAt` DESC

SELECT `predictRGID` ,sum(`result`="정확" AND `weatherType`='temp') AS `tempCorrect` ,sum(`result`="오보" AND `weatherType`='temp' ) AS `tempWrong` ,sum(`result`="정확" AND `weatherType`='rain') AS `rainCorrect` ,sum(`result`="오보" AND `weatherType`='rain' ) AS `rainWrong` FROM `userpredict` WHERE `scored` = 0 GROUP BY predictRGID;

SELECT `UPID` ,`predictOrder` ,`UID` ,`predictRGID` ,`weatherType` ,`predictedNum1` ,`predictedNum2` ,`realNum1` ,`realNum2` ,`result` ,`scored` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `userpredict` WHERE `predictRGID` = #{RGID} AND `weatherType` = #{weatherType} AND DATE(`createdAt`) = DATE(NOW())

SELECT `UPID` ,`predictOrder` ,`UID` ,`predictRGID` ,`weatherType` ,`predictedNum1` ,`predictedNum2` ,`realNum1` ,`realNum2` ,`result` ,`scored` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `userpredict` WHERE `UID` = #{UID} AND `predictRGID` = #{predictRGID} AND `weatherType` = #{weatherType} AND DATE(`createdAt`) = DATE(NOW())
